aboutme.en: I am currently a first-year graduate student in computing science graduate program in University of Alberta. My undergraduated program was computing science with specialization in University of Alberta.  My major focus is on statistics machine learning, data mining and video game development. Beyond computing science, my main interests are history, sports, and video games.
aboutme.ch: 目前为阿尔伯塔大学研究生在读生。本科同样毕业于阿尔伯塔大学。主攻统计机器学习、数据挖掘以及游戏开发。专业之外，历史、体育、以及电子游戏是我消遣时间的第二选择。
